description.english: Place a total of 100 models across your layout tables and dioramas.
description.german: Platziere insgesamt 100 Modelle auf deinen Layout-Tischen und Dioramen.

description.english: Exhibit your first railroad model layout at Exhibitions.
description.german: Präsentiere dein erstes Eisenbahnmodell-Layout bei Ausstellungen.
description.french: Exposez votre première maquette ferroviaire aux expositions.
description.italian: Esponi il tuo primo layout di modelli ferroviari alle esposizioni.
description.koreana: 전시회에서 첫 번째 철도 모델 레이아웃을 전시하세요.
description.spanish: Exhibe tu primer diseño de modelo ferroviario en exposiciones.
description.schinese: 在展览会上展示您的第一个铁路模型布局。
description.russian: Выставьте свою первую железнодорожную модель на выставке.

description.czech: Vystav svůj první model železnice na výstavách.

description.turkish: İlk tren modeli yerleşimini Sergilerde sergile.
description.brazilian: Exiba sua primeira maquete de trem em Exposições.

description.english: Earn 1000 coins from Exhibitions and Assignments.
description.german: Verdiene 1000 Münzen durch Ausstellungen und Aufträge.
description.french: Gagnez 1 000 pièces grâce aux expositions et aux missions.

description.schinese: 从展览和作业中赚取 1000 个金币。

description.english: Design a railroad layout to accommodate 10 trains running simultaneously.
description.german: Gestalte ein Eisenbahn-Layout, das 10 Züge gleichzeitig beherbergen kann.
description.french: Concevez un layout ferroviaire pour accueillir 10 trains circulant simultanément.
description.italian: Progetta un layout ferroviario per ospitare 10 treni che funzionano contemporaneamente.
description.koreana: 동시에 10대의 기차가 운행될 수 있는 철도 레이아웃을 설계하세요.
description.spanish: Diseña un diseño ferroviario que acomode 10 trenes funcionando simultáneamente.
description.schinese: 设计一个可以同时容纳10列火车运行的铁路布局。
description.russian: Создайте макет железной дороги, на котором одновременно работают 10 поездов.
description.japanese: 同時に10本の列車が走行できる鉄道レイアウトを設計する。
description.portuguese: Projete um layout ferroviário para acomodar 10 trens funcionando simultaneamente.
description.polish: Zaprojektuj układ kolejowy, aby pomieścić 10 pociągów kursujących jednocześnie.
description.hungarian: Tervezd meg egy vasúti elrendezést, amely lehetővé teszi, hogy egyszerre 10 vonat működjön.
description.czech: Navrhni železniční rozvrh pro 10 vlaků běžících současně.
description.romanian: Proiectează o machetă de cale ferată care să poată acomoda 10 trenuri care funcționează simultan.
description.turkish: Aynı anda 10 trenin çalışabileceği bir demiryolu düzeni tasarla.
description.brazilian: Projete um layout ferroviário para acomodar 10 trens funcionando simultaneamente.

description.japanese: チュートリアルを完了する。

description.english: Paint one model with at least 5 different colors.
description.german: Bemale ein Modell mit mindestens 5 verschiedenen Farben.
description.french: Peignez un modèle avec au moins 5 couleurs différentes.
description.italian: Dipingi un modello con almeno 5 colori diversi.
description.koreana: 하나의 모델에 5가지 이상의 다른 색상으로 칠하세요.
description.spanish: Pinta un modelo con al menos 5 colores diferentes.
description.schinese: 给一个模型上至少5种不同的颜色。
description.russian: Разрисуйте одну модель как минимум 5 разными цветами.
description.japanese: 少なくとも5色で1つのモデルを塗装する。
description.portuguese: Pinte um modelo com pelo menos 5 cores diferentes.
description.polish: Pomaluj jeden model, używając co najmniej 5 różnych kolorów.
description.hungarian: Fess ki egy modellt legalább 5 különböző színnel.
description.czech: Vymaluj jeden model alespoň 5 různými barvami.
description.romanian: Vopsește un model folosind cel puțin 5 culori diferite.
description.turkish: Bir modeli en az 5 farklı renkle boya.
description.brazilian: Pinte um modelo com pelo menos 5 cores diferentes.
